languages.text: "В библиотеке Лорд-капитана я нашла мемуары величайшего квартермейстера династии фон Валанциус — Сильверто де Йоно. Его хитроумные тактики помогут нам при абордаже".
languages.translation_comment: At the start of the boarding mission.

traits.locale_text: "В библиотеке Лорд-капитана я нашла мемуары величайшего квартермейстера династии фон Валанциус — Сильверто де Йоно. Его хитроумные тактики помогут нам при абордаже".

languages.text: "While perusing the Lord Captain's library, I discovered the memoirs of the greatest quartermaster who has ever served the von Valancius dynasty — Silverto de Iono. His sly tactics will be of great help to us during this boarding operation."
languages.translation_comment: At the start of the boarding mission.
languages.original_text: "В библиотеке Лорд-капитана я нашла мемуары величайшего квартермейстера династии фон Валанциус — Сильверто де Йоно. Его хитроумные тактики помогут нам при абордаже".

"While perusing the Lord Captain's library, I discovered the memoirs of the greatest quartermaster who has ever served the von Valancius dynasty — Silverto de Iono. His sly tactics will be of great help to us during this boarding operation."

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテンの図書室で蔵書を閲覧していたところ、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に仕えた中で最も優れた軍需士官――シルヴェルト・デ・イオーノの回想録を見つけました。彼の狡猾な戦術は、今回の乗船作戦できっと大いに役立つでしょう」
languages.original_text: "While perusing the Lord Captain's library, I discovered the memoirs of the greatest quartermaster who has ever served the von Valancius dynasty — Silverto de Iono. His sly tactics will be of great help to us during this boarding operation."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテンの図書室で蔵書を閲覧していたところ、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に仕えた中で最も優れた軍需士官――シルヴェルト・デ・イオーノの回想録を見つけました。彼の狡猾な戦術は、今回の乗船作戦できっと大いに役立つでしょう」

languages.text: "Ich habe in der Bibliothek des Lord Captains gestöbert und die Memoiren des größten Quartiermeisters entdeckt, der jemals der Dynastie von Valancius gedient hat ... Silverto de Iono. Seine gerissenen Taktiken werden uns bei dieser Entermission von großem Nutzen sein."
languages.original_text: "While perusing the Lord Captain's library, I discovered the memoirs of the greatest quartermaster who has ever served the von Valancius dynasty — Silverto de Iono. His sly tactics will be of great help to us during this boarding operation."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe in der Bibliothek des Lord Captains gestöbert und die Memoiren des größten Quartiermeisters entdeckt, der jemals der Dynastie von Valancius gedient hat ... Silverto de Iono. Seine gerissenen Taktiken werden uns bei dieser Entermission von großem Nutzen sein."

languages.text: « Dans la bibliothèque {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, j'ai découvert les mémoires du plus éminent quartier-maître à avoir jamais servi la dynastie von Valancius : Silverto de Iono. Ses tactiques habiles nous seront d'une grande aide lors de cette opération d'abordage. »
languages.original_text: "While perusing the Lord Captain's library, I discovered the memoirs of the greatest quartermaster who has ever served the von Valancius dynasty — Silverto de Iono. His sly tactics will be of great help to us during this boarding operation."

traits.locale_text: « Dans la bibliothèque {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, j'ai découvert les mémoires du plus éminent quartier-maître à avoir jamais servi la dynastie von Valancius : Silverto de Iono. Ses tactiques habiles nous seront d'une grande aide lors de cette opération d'abordage. »

languages.text: «Mientras inspeccionaba la biblioteca {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán, descubrí las memorias del mejor intendente que ha servido jamás a la dinastía von Valancius: Silverto de Iono. Sus astutas tácticas nos resultarán de mucha ayuda durante esta operación de abordaje».
languages.original_text: "While perusing the Lord Captain's library, I discovered the memoirs of the greatest quartermaster who has ever served the von Valancius dynasty — Silverto de Iono. His sly tactics will be of great help to us during this boarding operation."

traits.locale_text: «Mientras inspeccionaba la biblioteca {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán, descubrí las memorias del mejor intendente que ha servido jamás a la dinastía von Valancius: Silverto de Iono. Sus astutas tácticas nos resultarán de mucha ayuda durante esta operación de abordaje».

languages.text: “我在舰长大人的图书馆时，曾读过冯·瓦兰修斯王朝最伟大的军需官西尔弗托·德·伊欧诺的回忆录，学会了很多他曾用过的精明策略。这些策略一定会对这场战斗大有帮助。”
languages.original_text: "While perusing the Lord Captain's library, I discovered the memoirs of the greatest quartermaster who has ever served the von Valancius dynasty — Silverto de Iono. His sly tactics will be of great help to us during this boarding operation."

traits.locale_text: “我在舰长大人的图书馆时，曾读过冯·瓦兰修斯王朝最伟大的军需官西尔弗托·德·伊欧诺的回忆录，学会了很多他曾用过的精明策略。这些策略一定会对这场战斗大有帮助。”

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan'ın kütüphanesini incelerken von Valancius hanedanlığına hizmet etmiş en büyük levazım subayı Silverto de İono'nun anılarına denk geldim. Kurnaz taktikleri, bu bordalama görevinde bize yol gösterecek."
languages.original_text: "While perusing the Lord Captain's library, I discovered the memoirs of the greatest quartermaster who has ever served the von Valancius dynasty — Silverto de Iono. His sly tactics will be of great help to us during this boarding operation."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan'ın kütüphanesini incelerken von Valancius hanedanlığına hizmet etmiş en büyük levazım subayı Silverto de Iono'nun anılarına denk geldim. Kurnaz taktikleri, bu bordalama görevinde bize yol gösterecek."

languages.original_text: "While perusing the Lord Captain's library, I discovered the memoirs of the greatest quartermaster who has ever served the von Valancius dynasty — Silverto de Iono. His sly tactics will be of great help to us during this boarding operation."
